name: Fragments from The Cross, Vol. 2
description: A collaboration between Dead Can Dance keyboard player Jules Maxwell and guitarist Stevie J Jones (AIR, Brian Eno, Bryan Ferry, Craig Armstrong, Imogen Heap etc). Since October 2020 they have explored a sense of not knowing in their daily music improvisations. Each day is archived, raw and unedited, and presented in 5 volumes of 20 recordings. This volume contains the recordings from 13th November - 14th December 2020.
